name: Stronger Together (Burntbacon109)
description: You have been cursed into a dungeon with your partner - Sir Lancelot. To avoid being locked in this purgatory for eternity, you must fight through the dungeon and earn your freedom by reaching the exit. To aid you on your journey you have been given the axe. It is a formidable weapon, but be warned - if you throw the axe away your invulnerability will be lost and you shall be liable to DEATH. Good luck brave warrior!
